results.description: Dominic Thiem stuns Novak Djokovic in a gripping encounter to become the first player into the semi-finals at the ATP Finals in London.
results.shortTitle: Thiem stuns Djokovic to reach semis
results.title: Dominic Thiem beats Novak Djokovic as Roger Federer gets ATP Finals campaign on track

results.description: Andy Murray says the combination of a newborn baby, injury and lots of cake left him at his heaviest weight ever.
results.title: Andy Murray says new baby & cake made him heaviest of his career

results.description: The ATP World Tour finals continue at the O2 Arena in London - listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra commentary.
results.title: Listen: Novak Djokovic v Dominc Thiem

results.description: Former world number one Andy Murray believes he can still beat the world’s best after a successful return from hip surgery.
results.shortTitle: Murray can still beat world's best
results.title: Andy Murray: Former world number one believes he can beat the best

results.description: Former world number four and 2014 Australian Open runner-up Dominika Cibulková announces her retirement from tennis.
results.title: Dominika Cibulková retires from tennis at age of 30

results.description: Watch the best shots as Roger Federer recovers from his opening round-robin defeat to beat Italy's Matteo Berrettini in straight sets at the ATP Finals.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Federer beats Berrettini in must-win match at ATP Finals
results.title: ATP Finals: Rodger Federer beats Matteo Berrettini in must-win match

results.description: Andy Murray believes he is closer to beating Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic than he was "seven or eight" weeks ago.
results.shortTitle: Murray feels he could beat 'big three'
results.title: Andy Murray starts to believe he can beat Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal & Novak Djokovic again

results.description: The ATP World Tour finals continue at the O2 Arena in London - watch live BBC Two coverage and listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra commentary.
results.shortTitle: Watch: ATP Tour World Finals - Nadal v Medvedev
results.title: Watch: ATP Tour World Finals - Rafael Nadal v Daniil Medvedev & Stefanos Tsitsipas v Alexander Zverev

results.description: Rafael Nadal's bid to end the year as world number one falters with a straight-set loss to defending champion Alexander Zverev at the ATP Finals.
results.shortTitle: Nadal loses opener to Zverev in London
results.title: ATP Finals: Rafael Nadal loses to Alexander Zverev in opener

results.description: Watch the best shots as sixth seed Stefanos Tsitsipas wins his opening match at the ATP Finals by edging out fourth seed and fellow debutant Daniil Medvedev in London.
results.shortTitle: 'Brilliantly executed' - Tsitsipas edges Medvedev in London
results.title: ATP Finals: Stefanos Tsitsipas beats Daniil Medvedev in London opener

results.description: The ATP World Tour finals continue at the O2 Arena in London - listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: ATP Tour World Finals -Thiem beats Djokovic to reach semis
results.title: Listen: ATP Tour World Finals - Dominic Thiem beats Novak Djokovic

results.description: BBC TV, radio and online coverage times for the ATP season finale as the world's best players battle it out at London's O2 Arena.
results.shortTitle: ATP Finals live on BBC TV, radio & online
results.title: ATP Finals: BBC TV, radio and online coverage times

thumbnail.altText: Spain's Rafael Nadal, Switzerland's Roger Federer and Serbia's Novak Djokovic

results.description: Rafael Nadal, Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer chat to BBC Breakfast's Sally Nugent about what life is like being the top three male tennis players.
results.shortTitle: 'I see these guys more than my parents'
results.title: Nadal, Djokovic & Federer on rivalry and friendship on ATP tennis tour

thumbnail.altText: Rafa Nadal, Roger Federer & Novak Djokovic

results.description: Novak Djokovic makes a winning start at the ATP Finals but Roger Federer is beaten by Dominic Thiem in his opener.
results.title: Novak Djokovic wins ATP Finals opener but Roger Federer beaten by Dominic Thiem

results.description: The ATP Finals continue at the O2 Arena in London - listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: ATP Finals - Nadal beaten by Zverev
results.title: Listen: ATP Finals - Rafael Nadal beaten by Alexander Zverev

results.description: Watch five best shots Novak Djokovic made a winning start at the ATP Finals, beating Matteo Berrettini in straight sets.
results.shortTitle: Best shots from Djokovic's win over Berrettini in ATP Finals opener
results.title: ATP Finals: Watch five best shots as Novak Djokovic beats Matteo Berrettini in opener

results.description: France win the deciding doubles rubber in Australia to lift the Fed Cup for the first time since 2003.
results.shortTitle: France win Fed Cup in Australia decider
results.title: Fed Cup: France beat Australia in Perth to end 16-year wait
